comment: /**  * A pluggable strategy to load type converters into a registry from some kind of mechanism  *  * @param registry the registry to load the type converters into  * @throws org.apache.camel.TypeConverterLoaderException if the type converters could not be loaded  */
code: /**  * A pluggable strategy to load type converters into a registry from some kind of mechanism  *  * @param registry the registry to load the type converters into  * @throws org.apache.camel.TypeConverterLoaderException if the type converters could not be loaded  */ void load(TypeConverterRegistry registry) throws TypeConverterLoaderException.
